name: Hong Kong 2020
description:
Hong Kong is under attack! Only the legendary Chin can save the people from the oppressive government!

Hong Kong 2020 is a twin-stick style shooter. Use WASD to move and arrow keys to shoot. You only get one hit before it is Game Over, but you can become temporarily invincible with syringes.

Recommended for mature audiences.

ORIJENAL KONSEP DOUGHNUT STEEL!
